creator: volkmar@pogatzki.net
text:
On the download page http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/installation/download.html
there is a link for "Releases" pointing to empty directories:

http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/cocoon/lenya/

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
The main part of this problem was corrected: the link now points to the correct 
directory.

But the links at
http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/cocoon/lenya/
still point to empty directories.

This should change when Lenya is leaving the incubator. Putting a brief readme 
file in those directories would be good.
